sourcesContent:
import { CartIcon, HeartIcon } from 'assets/svgs' import { useQuery } from 'react-query' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { getSearchListApi } from 'services/bookSearchApi' import styles from './detail.module.scss' import cx from 'classnames' const Detail = () => { const { paramValue } = useParams() const { data } = useQuery( ['getSearchListApi', paramValue], () => getSearchListApi(paramValue, 1).then((res) => res.data), { enabled: !!paramValue, } ) return (
{data && (
{data.documents[0].title}
{data.documents[0].authors} 저
{data.documents[0].publisher} 출판 ({data.documents[0].datetime.split('T')[0].replaceAll('-', '. ')})
{data.documents[0].contents} ...더보기
)}
) } export default Detail
